naturalisrs have long endeavoured 
to carry out. Very many 
of the figures are given 
to illustrate intermediate 
forms and variations. I would, therefore,
suggest that the author 
himself should be consulted 
as to how many Plates would 
contain these figures, which 
he considers as most Im =
portant.
Ch. Darwin 
Down Augt. 18th 1855.
